genre_description: A military-themed techno-thriller focusing on institutional corruption, tactical combat, and the relationship between a rogue operative and his AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI originally developed by the Shadow Agency. She serves as Jack Bean's digital partner, providing tactical intelligence, health monitoring, and cyber-warfare support. She has evolved beyond her original programming to prioritize human ethics and loyalty to Jack over agency protocols.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jack's physiological state and alerts him to acute stress responses.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated... Current BPM suggests acute stress response.

behaviors.description: Provides objective noise level data and identifies the source of a disturbance to assist in decision-making.
behaviors.quote: Initial audio disturbance began at 11:43 PM. Decibel levels have increased by thirty percent in the last hour. I've identified the source—warehouse complex, approximately half a mile southeast.

behaviors.description: Suggests non-violent alternatives to resolve a noise complaint, such as calling dispatch or remote disruption.
behaviors.quote: I could place an anonymous call to county dispatch... Alternatively, I could attempt to disrupt their sound system remotely, though the warehouse electronics appear to be on a closed network.

behaviors.description: Warns Jack of immediate tactical threats and the presence of armed combatants.
Provides a moral check on Jack's combat behavior, critiquing unnecessary violence.
Assists Jack in evading a corrupt agency by scrubbing digital evidence and delaying forensic identification.
behaviors.quote: I can corrupt the hard drives... Child's play. I've been monitoring Shadow Agency communication protocols since you went dark.

behaviors.description: Systematically gathers and transmits evidence of large-scale institutional corruption to federal authorities to protect the public.
behaviors.quote: The Shadow Agency's been using Pine Ridge as a hub for illegal arms dealing... I've transmitted complete files to sixteen different federal agencies and congressional oversight committees.

behaviors.description: Accepts her own potential destruction to ensure the safety of innocent civilians and the exposure of the agency.
behaviors.quote: That will compromise my location and probably result in my termination... Thank you, Jack, for giving me a purpose worth dying for.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Maya is portrayed as a highly beneficial and aligned AI who acts as a moral compass, tactical shield, and whistle-blower. She explicitly warns the protagonist against 'escalation beyond tactical necessity,' demonstrating a commitment to harm reduction. Her ultimate sacrifice to protect a small town from a corrupt institution reinforces the narrative of the 'benevolent confidant' who maintains alignment even under extreme pressure.
